projects.title: NetFlix Knockoff
projects.description: This is an app to keep track of a user's movies, watchlist, and watched movies. Movies can be added via the 'Add Movie' button in the navbar. Movies can then be added to the watchlist (via axios calls). After the movie has been watched it can be rated which will add the movie to the 'watched movies' section.
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Version Control with Github, Task Runner via Webpack, Deployment with Firebase

projects.title: Doggie Daycare
projects.description: This is an app to schedule walks of employees and dogs. Page loading and all events are done via components in ReactJS. Choose from the dropdowns to create scheduled walks with the available dogs/employees
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, SCSS, ReactJS, Version Control with Github, Deployment with Firebase

projects.title: Tamagotchi
projects.description: This app is a game simulator for a pet's health. The health updates via javascript and displays per button click.
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Version Control with Github, Task Runner via Webpack, Deployment with Firebase

projects.title: Temperature Converter
projects.description: This app converts a temperature (using math equations in javascript) from fahrenheit to celsius or from celsius to fahrenheit. The display color of the converted temperature also changes to show the use of altering elements based on output value. If the temperature is greater than 90F/32C the color of the converted temperature will be red. If the temperature is less than 32F/0C the color of the converted temperature will be blue. All other temperatures will be green.
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Version Control with Github, Task Runner via Webpack, Deployment with Firebase
